reaction_view_description: In this game you must press the screen when the green light appears
reaction_sound_description: In this game you have to press on the screen when you hear a sound
reaction_vibration_description: In this game you have to press on the screen when you feel a vibration
memory_card_match_description: In this game you have to flip the cards and match them up in pairs
memory_numbers_description: In this game you have to remember the displayed number and then enter it
word_char_shuffle_description: In this game you have to make a word from the letters displayed
math_equations_description: In this game you have to solve the equation correctly
math_which_is_more_description: In this game you have to choose which equation is bigger
concentration_color_match_description: In this game you have to decide if the color of the text is the same as the color that is written
concentration_aim_lab_description: In this game you have to hit the displayed points as quickly as possible
no_results:
No results

The statistics will be available after at least one game
